direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve comprehensive lists of assets and pairs, respectively, from the margin account.
Both methods access margin-related data but focus on different aspects (pairs vs. price indices).
Both methods involve querying or manipulating margin account data, though they target different endpoints.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the margin account is a prerequisite for retrieving pairs or assets.
Setting up the environment ensures the margin account is ready for operations like retrieving pairs.
Verifying the list of pairs ensures the correctness and completeness of the retrieved data.
